rules.h1: font-manrope font-extrabold text-4xl md:text-5xl tracking-tight text-slate-900
rules.label: font-manrope font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500

buttons.primary: h-11 px-8 bg-violet-800 hover:bg-violet-900 text-white font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-11 px-8 bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: h-11 px-4 text-slate-600 hover:text-violet-700 hover:bg-violet-50 font-medium

cards.default: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer

inputs.default: h-11 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-violet-500/20 rounded-md transition-all

badges.success: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.warning: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.neutral: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Preferred: Tent, Map, Award, Users, Calendar, Shield, Star, Compass

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, friendly feel.
Maintain the 'White & Light Purple' theme requested by the user, but ground it with Slate neutrals.
Admin dashboard should be dense and functional (Control Room Grid).
User dashboard should be visual and encouraging (Tetris Grid).
Use the provided image URLs for specific contexts (Events, Badges).
Always add padding inside containers with borders.
